metadata.description: Steve Jobs is an elusive and private individual. He shuns the public eye. He keeps to himself. He's not a paparazzi driven, media-hungry entity. He's a creator, an inventor, a genius. And he's the brains behind some of Apple's biggest items. Learn here the story behind the man, the legend of Steve Jobs. Get the inside scoop on what drives him to create and where his first need for intelligence came from. From his first Apple computer all the way to the newest inventions, learn how this man has shaped the company, and himself, for the better.
metadata.name: Steve Jobs Co Founder of Apple
